title: Taiwan Seeks Strong AI Partnership with U.S. through Major Investment Deal
description: Taiwan aims to forge a strategic partnership with the U.S. in artificial intelligence by cutting tariffs and boosting its investment in the U.S., as per Vice Premier Cheng Li-chiun. A new deal will see Taiwanese firms invest $250 billion in the U.S., focusing on semiconductors, energy, and AI.
content: Taiwan is aiming to establish a strong strategic partnership with the United States in the realm of artificial intelligence. This follows the signing of a significant trade deal intended to cut tariffs and bolster Taiwanese investment in America, acc... [682 chars]

title: Yen in Focus as Global Markets Eye Tokyo's Moves
description: Global markets were poised for a positive close on the week as artificial intelligence trading gains momentum. The spotlight is on the yen, with Japan's Finance Minister hinting at possible intervention. Elsewhere, oil and precious metals are reacting to geopolitical tensions, while the U.S. dollar remains robust.
content: As the week wraps up, global markets are showing signs of positivity, largely driven by renewed interest in artificial intelligence trading strategies. However, the focal point for investors remains the yen, with Japan's potential moves to support it... [739 chars]

title: Trump administration imposes 25% tariff on certain advanced AI Chips
description: President Donald Trump announced a new 25% tariff on certain advanced artificial intelligence semiconductors.
content:
President Donald Trump announced a new 25% tariff on certain advanced artificial intelligence semiconductors, escalating U.S. trade measures aimed at bolstering domestic chip manufacturing and addressing national security concerns.

title: The rewarding, high-paid and storied trade job AI can't fill - but humans don't want
description: As artificial intelligence infiltrates more and more industries across the globe, workers are becoming increasingly stressed about job losses.
content:
Artificial intelligence is eating jobs everywhere — except one craft so precise that even a hair’s-width mistake ruins days of work.
Few workplaces haven't been affected. AI is in supermarkets, at doctor's offices, and even monitoring farms.

title: How the White House and governors want to fix AI-driven power shortages and price spikes
description: The White House and a bipartisan group of governors are holding an event Friday taking aim at power shortages and price spikes from data centers for artificial intelligence
content: The White House and a bipartisan group of governors are pressuring the operator of the mid-Atlantic power grid to take urgent steps to boost energy supply and curb price hikes, holding a Friday event aimed at addressing a rising concern among voters ... [374 chars]
